file.name: data_schema.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: COVID-19 Community Response
  version: "1.0.0"
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'
paths:
    /:
        get:
            responses:
                '200':
                    description: 'Data to initialise the Map'
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DashboardData'
components:
  schemas:  # Reusable Schemas
    DashboardData:
      description: Schema for data used on the COVID-19 Community Response dashboard.
      type: object
      properties:
        variables:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Variables'
        LAs:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/LAs'
        LSOAs:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/LSOAs'


    Variable:
      type: object
      description: Information about each data variable
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          description: variable id, same as column name from csv
        label:
          type: string
          description: Human readable label
        class:
          type: string
          enum: ['support', 'challenge']
          description: The group that the data belongs to
        lsoa:
          type: boolean
          description: Whether this data available at LSOA level, as well as LA.

    Variables:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/Variable'

    LA:
      type: object
      description: Information about each Local Authority
      properties:
        lad19nm:
          type: string
        lad19cd:
          type: string
        population_count:
          type: number
        pop_density_persqkm:
          type: number
        has_internet_pct:
          type: number
        vulnerable_pct:
          type: number
        over_65_count:
          type: number
        use_internet_daily_percent:
          type: number
        wimd:
          type: number
        belong_percent:
          type: number
        welsh_percent:
          type: number
        covid_per100k:
          type: number
        groups_count:
          type: number
        shielded_percent:
          type: number

    LAs:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/LA'

    LSOA:
      type: object
      description: Information about each Local Authority
      properties:
        LSOA11CD:
          type: string
        LSOA11NM:
          type: string
        welsh_percent:
          type: number
        wimd:
          type: number
        population_count:
          type: number
        pop_density_persqkm:
          type: number
        over_65_count:
          type: number

    LSOAs:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/LSOA'
    
    GroupData:
      description: Schema for Community Response point data on the dashboard.
      type: object
      properties:
        groups:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/groups'

    group:
      type: object
      description: Information about each group point on the map
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          description: Unique identifier for the group.
        name:
          type: string
          description: Name of the group
        platform:
          type: string
          description: Which platform the group exists on
          example: "Facebook"
        lat:
          type: number
        long:
          type: number

    groups:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/group'
